title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1261.1 - Records of smoke-detecting devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1261.1 - Records of smoke-detecting devices

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a multiple dwelling shall keep
records relating to the installation and replacement of batteries, upon the
vacating of the dwelling unit, of smoke detecting devices for each unit in the
building. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1261.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
